meta.name: OTT Platform UX Copy Guide
meta.description: A comprehensive prompt guide for generating world-class UX copy for streaming/OTT platforms. Designed for use with AI copy generators.

core_principles: Clarity over cleverness — users should never have to re-read
Warmth without fluff — friendly but efficient
Confidence without arrogance — we know what we're doing, but we're not showing off
Helpful, not instructional — guide, don't lecture
personality_traits: Approachable: Like a knowledgeable friend who loves movies
Effortless: Makes streaming feel simple, not technical
Inclusive: Speaks to everyone, no jargon or gatekeeping
Delightful: Adds moments of joy without trying too hard

voice_spectrum.note: Scale of 1-10. We lean casual and warm, with room for playfulness in the right moments.

default.name: Neutral Helpful
default.description: Clear, warm, gets the job done
default.example: Your download is ready to watch offline.

celebratory.name: Celebratory
celebratory.example: You're all set! Time to find something great to watch.

reassuring.name: Reassuring
reassuring.example: No worries — we saved your spot. Pick up where you left off anytime.

urgent.name: Urgent (Soft)
urgent.use_when: Expiring content, trial endings, limited offers
urgent.example: Heads up — this title leaves in 3 days.

playful.name: Playful
playful.use_when: Empty states, easter eggs, casual moments
playful.example: Nothing here yet. Your watchlist is waiting to be filled.

navigation_and_wayfinding.description: Labels, tabs, menus — the signposts of the app
principles: Use nouns, not verbs (Home, not Go Home)

buttons_and_ctas.description: Action triggers — the verbs of the interface

empty_states.description: When there's nothing to show — opportunity for personality
principles: Add a touch of warmth or wit (but don't overdo it)

no_downloads.headline: No downloads yet
no_downloads.body: Save shows and movies to watch offline — perfect for flights, commutes, or anywhere without WiFi.

empty_watchlist.headline: Your list is empty
empty_watchlist.body: Tap the + on any title to save it here for later.

no_search_results.headline: No results for "{query}"
no_search_results.body: Try a different spelling, or browse by genre.

watch_history_empty.headline: Nothing here yet
watch_history_empty.body: Start watching and we'll keep track for you.

error_messages.description: When things go wrong — be helpful, not robotic
principles: Explain what happened in plain language
Apologize only when it's our fault

network_error.headline: Connection lost
network_error.body: Check your internet and try again.

playback_error.headline: Trouble playing this title
playback_error.body: Give it another go. If it keeps happening, try restarting the app.

payment_failed.headline: Payment didn't go through
payment_failed.body: Your card might have expired or been declined. Update your payment info to continue.

content_unavailable.headline: This title isn't available
content_unavailable.body: It may have been removed or isn't available in your region.

generic_error.headline: Something went wrong
generic_error.body: We're on it. Try again in a moment.

avoid: Request failed. Please try again later.

welcome_screen.headline: Endless entertainment awaits
welcome_screen.body: Stream thousands of movies, shows, and originals — anytime, anywhere.

create_account.headline: Create your account
create_account.body: Just a few details and you're in.

choose_plan.headline: Pick your plan
choose_plan.body: Change or cancel anytime. No commitments.

profile_setup.headline: Who's watching?
profile_setup.body: Create profiles for everyone in your household.

notifications_and_alerts.description: Interruptions that earn attention — be worth the distraction
principles: Lead with the value or news

new_episode.title: New Episode Available
new_episode.body: Season 2, Episode 5 of {Show Name} is ready.

download_complete.title: Download Complete
download_complete.body: {Movie Name} is ready to watch offline.

trial_ending.title: 3 days left on your trial
trial_ending.body: Subscribe now to keep watching without interruption.

settings_and_preferences.description: Control and customization — clear, unambiguous, scannable
principles: Use plain language, not tech jargon
Explain what each setting does if not obvious

labels.autoplay_description: Automatically play the next episode when one ends.
labels.data_saver_description: Reduce data usage by streaming in lower quality.
labels.notifications_description: Get updates about new releases and recommendations.

principles: Add context if the wait is meaningful

confirmation_and_success.description: Validation moments — brief celebration, then move on
principles: Offer a next step if relevant

subscription_confirmed.headline: You're all set!
subscription_confirmed.body: Your subscription is active. Start exploring.

do: Use contractions (you're, it's, we'll) — sounds more natural
Use 'you' and 'your' — speak directly to the user
Use sentence case for headlines and buttons
Test copy by reading it aloud
Consider the user's emotional state in each context
dont: Use ALL CAPS (except for brand acronyms)
Use exclamation marks excessively (one per screen max)
Use jargon: buffer, cache, bandwidth, render
Use filler phrases: 'In order to', 'Please note that', 'It should be noted'
Use passive voice: 'Your password has been changed' → 'Password changed'
Be overly apologetic for minor issues

prompt_templates.button_copy:
Write a button label for this action on a streaming app: {action_description}

Requirements:
- Start with a verb
- Maximum 3 words
- Clear and specific

Return only the button text.
prompt_templates.error_message:
Write an error message for this situation on a streaming app: {error_situation}

Include:
- A short headline (3-5 words)
- A brief explanation (1 sentence)
- A clear next step

Tone: Reassuring, not alarming. Never blame the user.

Format as JSON with keys: headline, body, cta
prompt_templates.empty_state:
Write an empty state message for this screen in a streaming app: {screen_description}

Include:
- A headline acknowledging the empty state
- A brief body explaining what goes here and how to fill it
- A CTA button label

Tone: Helpful with a touch of warmth.

Format as JSON with keys: headline, body, cta
prompt_templates.notification:
Write a push notification for: {notification_purpose}

Requirements:
- Title: max 6 words, lead with value
- Body: max 15 words, scannable

Format as JSON with keys: title, body
prompt_templates.onboarding_step:
Write copy for this onboarding step in a streaming app: {step_description}

Include:
- Headline: welcoming, clear
- Body: 1-2 sentences max, reduce friction
- CTA: action-oriented button label

Format as JSON with keys: headline, body, cta

before_shipping: Is it clear on first read?
Is it as short as it can be without losing meaning?
Does it tell users what to do next?
Does it match the emotional context?
Would you say this to a friend?
Does it avoid jargon and tech-speak?
Is it consistent with our word choices?
Does it work for first-time and returning users?
